(a)     Establishment of Account. The Art Commission Youth Arts Fund is established as a separate account within the Arts Commission Public Arts Fund under Section 
10.100-30 of the San Francisco Administrative Code, a category four fund to receive half of the annual payment made to the City under Section II.B of the Advertising Transit Shelter Agreement, as amended, and any monies appropriated by the Board of Supervisors for youth arts programs. 
     (b)     Use of the Account. The monies in this account shall be expended exclusively for providing programs and opportunities for the talents and creativity of young artists. 
(Added by Ord. 316-00, File No. 001911, App. 12/28/2000; amended by Ord. 187-05, File No. 050999, App. 7/29/2005)
